title: OT24: Hopen Change
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author made some changes in the blog, such as fixing bugs and standardizing ads.
- Some new links have been added to the blogroll, and the author is still thinking about how to categorize them.
- The author received interesting comments about cognitive-behavioral therapy and learned that its true benefits come from regular practice.
- The author has opened a Patreon account for people who want to donate, but he emphasizes that it is not necessary, and he does not need the money.

Key learnings:
- Cognitive-behavioral therapy can be effective, but only with regular practice.
- Bloggers can receive financial support through Patreon.

Key questions:
- None mentioned in this portion of the blog post.
